views.label: Board
views.prompt: Run /wicked-kanban:board-status to get the current kanban board state. Display it as a kanban board with swimlanes for each status (pending, in_progress, completed). Each task card should show: title, priority badge, project name, and blocked status. Use color coding: red for blocked, yellow for high priority, green for completed.

views.label: Projects
views.prompt: Run /wicked-kanban:board-status and group tasks by project/initiative. Show each project as a card with: project name, task count by status (pending/in-progress/done), and a mini progress bar.

views.label: Blocked
views.prompt: Run /wicked-kanban:board-status and filter for blocked tasks only. Show each blocked task as an alert card with: task name, what it's blocked by, priority, and how long it's been blocked.

actions.label: New Task
actions.prompt: Ask the user for task details (title, description, priority), then use /wicked-kanban:new-task to create it.
